summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6001 for the improvement of 40th Avenue West from West Cramer Street to Hooker Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 80534, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
